# {filebin}

A R wrapper for the [Filebin](https://filebin.net/) API.

## Endpoints

File endpoints:

- [X] `GET /{bin}/{filename}`
- [ ] `DELETE /{bin}/{filename}`
- [X] `POST /{bin}/{filename}`

Bin endpoints:

- [ ] `GET /{bin}`
- [ ] `PUT /{bin}`
- [ ] `DELETE /{bin}`
- [ ] `GET /qr/{bin}`
- [ ] `GET /archive/{bin}/tar`
- [ ] `GET /archive/{bin}/zip`
